page.title: 15Finedon Playground Games
page.content: {Skin the Snake} Get a line of people.The first person puts his left hand through his legs and the next one holds it with his right hand and this is repeated down the line.The whole line moves backwards and the last person lies down as the line moves over him.This goes on till everyone is lying down holding hands. The line then gets up and moves forward into orignal place. {French Skipping} You need a long loop of elastic.Two people stand inside this and stretch it round their ankles.A third person standing in the middle jumps backwards and forwards over the elastic to a pattern.When the pattern is finished the elastic is moved up to knee level and the pattern is repeated.The elastic rises until the skipper fails, then someone else takes a turn.
